𓇶 Sun ≈ 𒀀𒀭𒎌 #zunni 𒍪𒌦𒉡 zu-un-nu zunnu 𒄑𒉡𒉡 "rain" 𓇲 •rays 𓇶 Sun ≈ 𒀀𒀭𒎌 #zunni •snow Schauer shower
